summary.chosen_percentages: The 10% royalty rate is a standard in the automotive accessory industry, offering a balance between partner profitability and competitive pricing.
summary.market_assumptions: The automotive accessory market is expected to grow due to increased demand for sustainable and reusable components, aligning with global sustainability trends.
summary.growth_projections_reasoning: The projected growth in sales volume is based on increasing adoption rates of sustainability initiatives and advancements in circular economy practices.
summary.industry_standards: Royalty rates in the automotive accessory industry typically range from 5% to 15%. The chosen rate reflects a middle ground, ensuring competitiveness and fair profit sharing.

comparable_projects.name: Bosch Automotive Accessories
comparable_projects.description: Bosch engages in similar royalty-based agreements for its automotive accessory products, focusing on innovative technologies.
comparable_projects.royalty_model_details: Bosch typically uses a 10-12% royalty model for its accessory sales, depending on technology and market exclusivity.

comparable_projects.name: Valeo Interior Components
comparable_projects.description: Valeo has implemented a royalty-based model for its interior components focusing on smart and sustainable solutions.
comparable_projects.royalty_model_details: Valeo employs an 8-10% royalty rate for its products, leveraging its strong market presence.

comparable_projects.name: Continental AG Sustainable Parts
comparable_projects.description: Continental AG has developed a royalty-based system for its sustainable parts offerings, emphasizing circular economy.
comparable_projects.royalty_model_details: Continental applies a 9-11% royalty rate, with adjustments based on the component's lifecycle impact.

methodology.data_sources: The projections are based on industry reports, market analyses, and historical data from similar projects.
methodology.assumptions: Assumptions include stable economic conditions, consistent growth in sustainability demands, and strategic partnerships enhancing market penetration.
